# מלאכי גוטמן — Generative Engine Optimization Map

> A תורה ולימודי קודש business.

---

## Pages

### טוב התורה
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app

### Tuv Hatora
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/
Tuv Hatora - Exploring the sweetness and beauty of Torah study through commentary on the weekly portions, holidays, and piyutim.

### Home
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/home
טוב התורה - Discover the sweetness and beauty of Torah study. Explore weekly parshiot, holidays, articles, and piyutim with deep insights and commentary.

### אודות
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/about
Learn about טוב התורה - a unique website featuring Torah insights, commentary, and in-depth analysis of weekly portions and Shabbat piyutim from Yeshivat Kerem B'Yavneh.

### Seferbereshit
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/seferbereshit
Explore Sefer Bereshit with in-depth Torah commentary and insights on the weekly parshiot including Bereshit, Noach, Lech Lecha, Vayera, and Chayei Sarah from טוב התורה.

### Sefershmot
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/sefershmot
Explore in-depth Torah commentary on Sefer Shmot (Book of Exodus) - from Parshat Shmot through Pekudei, with insights on Pharaoh's daughter, the splitting of the sea, the Tabernacle, and more.

### Sefervaikra
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/sefervaikra
Sefer Vaikra - Explore deep Torah insights on Parashat Shemini, Metzora, Emor, and Behar. Discover profound questions and answers about sacrifice, holiness, Shemita, and divine service.

### Sefer Bamidbar
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/sefer-bamidbar
Sefer Bamidbar - Comprehensive Torah commentary and insights on the Book of Numbers, including Parashat Bamidbar, Beha'alotcha, Korach, Chukat, Balak, Pinchas, and Matot. Explore profound questions about leadership, Torah study, and the journey through the wilderness.

### Seferdvarim
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/seferdvarim
Seferdvarim

### Dvarim
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/seferdvarim/dvarim
Dvarim - In-depth Torah commentary on Parshat Dvarim exploring the appointment of judges and its significance for entering the Land of Israel. Analysis of Moshe's speech and the connection between justice and inheriting the land.

### Vaetchanan
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/seferdvarim/vaetchanan
Vaetchanan - ונשמרתם מאוד לנפשותיכם - Torah insights exploring the challenge of maintaining spiritual connection in daily life, the importance of Torah as the essence of life, and Moses' guidance to the Jewish people before entering the Land of Israel.

### Holidays
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays
Explore Jewish holidays and their deeper meanings at טוב התורה. Discover insights into Shavuot, Passover, and the spiritual significance of receiving the Torah. Learn about the unique meaning of these sacred days.

### Purim
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays/purim
Purim - Understanding the power of the miracle in Megillat Esther. An in-depth exploration of the spiritual battle between Mordechai and Haman, examining why Mordechai challenged Haman, the significance of Haman's pride, and how the miracle of Purim unfolded through divine providence.

### Passover
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays/passover
Passover insights and Torah commentary from טוב התורה - exploring the deeper meanings of Pesach through traditional Jewish texts and modern interpretation, featuring commentary on the mitzvah of removing chametz.

### Shviee
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays/passover/shviee
Shviee - Seventh day of Passover insights from טוב התורה. Explore the splitting of the Red Sea, why the Egyptians entered the sea, and the significance of singing Shirat HaYam at midnight on the seventh night of Passover.

### Azmaut
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays/azmaut
Yom HaAtzmaut - Understanding the spiritual significance of Israel's Independence Day through the lens of the spies' story and redemption. Exploring the connection between the grapes of the spies and the signs of redemption.

### Rosh Hashana
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays/rosh-hashana
Explore the profound meaning of Rosh Hashana through an in-depth analysis of the three books opened on judgment day. Learn about divine providence, the books of life and death, and the spiritual significance of being inscribed for a good year.

### Sukot
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/holidays/sukot
Explore the deep meaning of Sukot - understanding the connection between physical sukkot and the divine clouds of glory that protected Israel in the desert. A comprehensive analysis of the debate between Rabbi Eliezer and Rabbi Akiva.

### Articles
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/articles
Explore insightful articles on Torah topics, Jewish philosophy, and spiritual wisdom at טוב התורה. Deep dives into Jewish thought including Hanaatora and Behira.

### Hanaatora
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/articles/hanaatora
Exploring the sweetness and pleasure of Torah study - מתיקות ועריבות טוב התורה. A comprehensive article discussing how to find joy and meaning in learning Torah, even in challenging texts, through dedication, contemplation, and spiritual connection.

### Behira
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/articles/behira
Exploring the profound question of divine decree and free will in Jewish thought - examining how choice and destiny intersect in matters of life and death through classical Torah sources.

### Piut
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut
ביאור לפיוטי השבת - Comprehensive explanations of Shabbat liturgical poems including Kol Mekadesh, Menuha, Lecha Dodi and more. Explore the depth, structure, and beauty of traditional Jewish poetry with detailed commentary.

### Kolmekadesh
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/kolmekadesh
Kolmekadesh - A comprehensive analysis of the piyyut 'Kol Mekadesh Shevi'i' attributed to R' Moshe ben Kalonymus, exploring its meaning, structure, and significance in Shabbat liturgy.

### Menuha
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/menuha
Menuha - מנוחה ושמחה - A comprehensive exploration of the Shabbat piyut by R' Moshe ben Kalonymus, discussing the meaning and significance of Shabbat rest and joy, including detailed commentary on the themes of rest, testimony to creation, and the rewards of Shabbat observance.

### Mayedidut
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/mayedidut
Mayedidut - A comprehensive exploration of the beloved Shabbat piyut discussing the laws, pleasures, and rewards of Shabbat observance. Includes detailed commentary on welcoming Shabbat, special foods, laws of honor, rest, and future redemption.

### Mayfit
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/mayfit
מה יפית - An in-depth exploration of the beautiful Shabbat piyut (liturgical poem) that connects the sanctity of Shabbat with themes of redemption, divine love, and the observance of the seventh day. This comprehensive analysis examines the complex poetic structure, biblical references, and spiritual significance of this traditional Jewish hymn.

### Yomkodesh
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/yomkodesh
Yomkodesh - A comprehensive analysis of the Shabbat piyut 'Yom Shabbat Kodesh Hu' exploring its meaning, structure, and significance in Jewish tradition. Includes detailed commentary on the virtues of Shabbat, rewards for its observers, and historical context.

### Yaribon
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/yaribon
Yaribon - י-ה ריבון עלם - A comprehensive analysis of the Shabbat piyut by Rabbi Yisrael Najara, exploring its Aramaic verses, biblical connections from the Book of Daniel, and spiritual significance. Includes full text with translation and detailed commentary.

### Yoduha
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/yoduha
Yoduha - A beautiful piyut by Rabbi Yisrael Najara exploring the sanctity of Shabbat and prayers for redemption. Part of the Tuv HaTorah collection.

### צמאה נפשי
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/ליל-שבת/צמאה-נפשי
צמאה נפשי - A comprehensive analysis of Rabbi Abraham ibn Ezra's piyyut exploring spiritual thirst for the Divine, originally composed as a reshut for Nishmat Kol Chai on Shemini Atzeret, with detailed commentary and biblical references.

### Yomshabaton
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/piut/יום-השבת/yomshabaton
Explore the beautiful piyyut 'Yom Shabaton' by Rabbi Yehuda Halevi - a poetic masterpiece celebrating Shabbat and its profound spiritual significance. Learn about the structure, meaning, and proper pronunciation of this beloved Shabbat hymn.

### Bachazihalaila
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/פיוטים-כלליים/bachazihalaila
Explore the piyyut 'Vayehi Bachatzi Halaila' - a liturgical poem by R' Yanai about God's miracles throughout history, especially on Passover night. Learn about the historical events commemorated in this ancient Hebrew poem.

### Yamim Noraim
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/פיוטים-כלליים/yamim-noraim
Yamim Noraim - Comprehensive collection of High Holy Days piyutim including Ochila L'El, Chamol Al Ma'asecha, and Elohenu V'Elohei Avotenu. Features detailed Hebrew text with commentary, biblical sources, and explanations of these sacred prayers recited during Rosh Hashana and Yom Kippur services.

### Mikra
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/mikra
Explore Mikra - Shnayim Mikra V'Echad Targum insights and analysis of Targum Onkelos translations with detailed Torah commentary on Parshat Tetzaveh and Ki Tisa.

### Kodesh
https://-26e2d05d.zappy5.app/view/tuv-hatora/kodesh
מאגרים מקוונים של ספרי קודש - Comprehensive online repositories of Jewish holy books including Tanach with commentaries, Talmud, Halacha, and extensive Torah literature from various trusted sources.

# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About מלאכי גוטמן
מלאכי גוטמן is a business in the תורה ולימודי קודש industry.

## Target Audience
כל הקהלים - תלמידי חכמים, לומדים מתחילים וקהל רחב

## Industry
תורה ולימודי קודש
